---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk set user location"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/users/bulk/set-location"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sets user locations and room assignments in bulk.

**Prerequisites**: This endpoint requires UUIDs from other API calls:
1. **UserIds** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users) → Extract `Items[].UserId`
2. **LocationId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/locations/view](/docs/api/locations/get-all-site-locations-v-2) → Extract `Items[].LocationId`

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Bulk user selection wrapper for setting location and room assignments. Mirrors `BulkUserRequest<SetUserLocationRequest>`.","properties":{"UserIds":{"type":"array","description":"Explicit user identifiers to update when `IsSelectAll` is false.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"Request":{"type":"object","description":"Location and room update payload used by bulk set-location operations. Mirrors `Spark.Shared.Models.Requests.SetUserLocationRequest`.","properties":{"UserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User identifier. This field is ignored when used inside a bulk wrapper that provides `UserIds`/`IsSelectAll`."},"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"New primary location identifier. Set to null to unset the location (when permitted)."},"IsLocked":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, locks the user's location from further automated changes."},"Rooms":{"type":"array","description":"Rooms to assign to the user.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Room assignment entry used when setting a user's location. Mirrors `SetUserLocationRequestRoom`.","properties":{"CreateRoomIfNotExists":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, creates the room record if it does not already exist."},"Room":{"description":"Room details.","allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"A room within a location. (not visible to end users)"},"IsAvailable":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the room is available for internal reservations"},"IsExternallyAvailable":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether ordering"},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the room has been soft-deleted"},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the room was created"},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the room was last modified"},"LeadTimeThreshold":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Minimum lead time required before reserving this room"},"LeadTimeThresholdUnit":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Unit for lead time threshold","enum":["Hours","Days","Weeks"]},"LocationRoomAvailableTimes":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"object","description":"Defines a room's availability window for a specific day of the week","properties":{"LocationRoomAvailableTimeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for this availability record"},"LocationRoomId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Reference to the parent room"},"Weekday":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"maximum":6,"description":"Day of the week (0=Sunday, 1=Monday, ..., 6=Saturday)"},"WeekdayName":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Human-readable day name (e.g., 'Monday')"},"IsClosed":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the room is closed/unavailable on this day"},"LocalStartTime":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Start time of availability window in local time (HH:mm:ss true, clears existing room assignments before applying `Rooms`."}},"title":"SetUserLocationRequest"},"IsSelectAll":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, ignores `UserIds` and applies the operation to users matching `UsersRequest`.","default":false},"UsersRequest":{"description":"User selection criteria applied when `IsSelectAll` is true.","allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Query and selection options for users. Mirrors `Spark.Shared.Models.Requests.GetUsersRequestV1`.","properties":{"Filters":{"type":"array","description":"Collection of facet filters applied to the user directory.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Universal filter structure used across all search endpoints (Tickets, Assets, Users). Each FilterMatch targets a specific facet and provides criteria through either the `Id` field (for entity references) or the `Value` field (for expressions).\n\n## Supported Entity Types\n\n| Entity | Facet Key Reference | Total Facets |\n|--------|---------------------|-------------|\n| Tickets | `TicketSearchFacetKey` | 103 |\n| Assets | `AssetSearchFacetKey` | 75 |\n| Users | `UserSearchFacetKey` | 41 |\n\n## Field Usage by Facet Type\n\n| Facet Type | Use Field | Example |\n|------------|-----------|--------|\n| Entity reference (status, agent, location) | `Id` | `{\"Facet\": \"status\", \"Id\": \"guid-here\"}` |\n| Date expression | `Value` | `{\"Facet\": \"createddate\", \"Value\": \"range:thisweek\"}` |\n| Numeric expression | `Value` | `{\"Facet\": \"purchasedprice\", \"Value\": \"numoperator:greaterthan:100\"}` |\n| Keyword search | `Value` | `{\"Facet\": \"keyword\", \"Value\": \"laptop\"}` |\n| Boolean facet | `Value` | `{\"Facet\": \"isurgent\", \"Value\": \"true\"}` |\n\n## Filter Combination Logic\n\n- **Default (AND)**: All filters are combined with AND logic\n- **OR within groups**: Filters with the same `GroupIndex` are combined with OR logic\n- **Exclusion**: Set `Negative: true` to exclude matching records\n\n## Expression Syntax Reference\n\nSee `DateExpressionSyntax` and `NumericExpressionSyntax` schemas for detailed syntax documentation.\n\n## Universal Facets\n\nSix facets are shared across all search endpoints: `grade`, `location`, `locationtype`, `role`, `source`, `user`. See `UniversalFacets` schema for detailed cross-entity behavior documentation.","properties":{"Facet":{"type":"string","description":"The facet key identifying the filter type. Valid values depend on the entity being searched:\n- Tickets: See `TicketSearchFacetKey`\n- Assets: See `AssetSearchFacetKey`\n- Users: See `UserSearchFacetKey`\n\nRetrieve available facets via `/api/v1.0/filters/for/entitytype/{entityTypeId}`.","example":"status"},"FacetName":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Human-readable display name for the facet. Populated by the UI when saving filters.","example":"Ticket Status"},"Name":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Display label for the selected value. Populated by the UI for saved filters.","example":"Open"},"Id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID value for entity-reference facets. Use this field when filtering by a specific entity's identifier (e.g., status ID, location ID, user ID).","example":"11111111-2222-3333-4444-555555555555"},"Value":{"type":"string","description":"String value for expression-based facets. Syntax varies by facet type:\n- Date facets: See `DateExpressionSyntax` (e.g., `range:thisweek`, `date>=01/01/2024`)\n- Numeric facets: See `NumericExpressionSyntax` (e.g., `numoperator:greaterthan:100`)\n- Keyword: Plain text search term\n- Boolean: `true` or `false`","example":"range:thisweek"},"Negative":{"type":"boolean","default":false,"description":"When `true`, excludes records matching this filter instead of including them. Inverts the filter logic.","example":false},"GroupIndex":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"default":0,"description":"Groups filters for OR logic. Filters with the same `GroupIndex` are combined with OR, then groups are combined with AND. Default value of 0 means all filters use AND logic.","example":0},"Selected":{"type":"boolean","default":true,"description":"Indicates the filter is active. Always `true` when applying filters via API.","example":true},"CustomFieldTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the custom field type when this filter targets a custom field. Used with facets like `usercustomfield`, `assetcustomfield`, or `ticketcustomfield`."},"ComplexEditorPath":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Path identifier for complex editor configuration. Used when the filter requires a specialized UI editor component."},"SortOrder":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Sort order hint for display purposes when presenting multiple filter options."},"AggregateOperation":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"enum":["and","or"],"description":"Logical operation for aggregate filters. When set, this filter acts as a container combining `Children` filters with the specified operation. Use `and` to require all children match, `or` to match any child."},"Children":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"description":"Nested filter conditions for aggregate filters. Only used when `AggregateOperation` is set. Allows building complex nested filter expressions.","items":"circular(FilterMatch)"}},"required":["Facet"],"example":{"Facet":"status","FacetName":"Status","Name":"Open","Id":"38889bac-91aa-e711-80c2-100dffa00001","Negative":false,"GroupIndex":0,"Selected":true},"title":"FilterMatch"}},"OnlyShowDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, returns only deleted users.","default":false},"FieldsToReturn":{"type":"array","description":"Optional list of field names to include in results.","items":{"type":"string"}},"CommandTimeout":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Optional command timeout in seconds."},"IncludeUsersDeletedSinceDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"description":"When provided, includes users deleted since the supplied timestamp."},"ExcludeNoAccess":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, excludes users with no access.","default":false},"ClearObjectProperties":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, returns a flat user (object-type properties removed).","default":false},"IncludeDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, includes deleted users in the result set.","default":false},"Source":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Hint for where the request came from (for example, `EditRequestor`)."},"BypassIndex":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, forces a SQL query instead of eventually-consistent index results.","default":false},"RevisionDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"description":"When provided, returns users as of the supplied revision date."}},"title":"GetUsersRequestV1"}]}},"required":["Request"],"title":"BulkSetUserLocationRequest"},"example":{"UserIds":["51c89694-ae9f-f011-8e61-6045bd7991ab","62d8a705-bf9f-f011-8e61-6045bd7991ab"],"Request":{"LocationId":"cc7dede9-f5f5-e622-b89a-116167cc111f","IsLocked":false,"ClearExistingRooms":true}}}}}}
